submodules.title: User Authentication UI
submodules.description: A visually appealing and user-friendly interface for user authentication, including login and signup forms. The UI will incorporate form validations to ensure data integrity, providing real-time feedback to users on their input.

submodules.title: Home Page
submodules.description: The main entry point of the application, showcasing featured products, promotional banners, and special offers. The design will be responsive and optimized for various devices, ensuring a seamless user experience.

submodules.title: Product Showcase
submodules.description: A dedicated section for displaying products with high-quality images, detailed descriptions, and user reviews. This module will enhance user engagement by allowing customers to filter and sort products based on various criteria.

submodules.title: Cart and Checkout Process
submodules.description: An intuitive shopping cart interface that allows users to review their selected items, adjust quantities, and proceed to a streamlined checkout process. This module will include features for applying discount codes and selecting shipping options.

submodules.title: RESTful API Development
submodules.description: Creation of a robust set of RESTful APIs that facilitate communication between the frontend and backend. These APIs will handle requests for product listings, user authentication, order processing, and more, ensuring efficient data exchange.

submodules.title: Database Architecture
submodules.description: Designing a scalable and efficient database schema that supports the storage and retrieval of product information, user data, and order history. This module will focus on normalization, indexing, and ensuring data security.

submodules.title: User Authentication Service
submodules.description: A secure service responsible for managing user authentication processes, including registration, login, password recovery, and session management. This module will implement industry-standard security practices to protect user data.

submodules.title: Payment Gateway Integration
submodules.description: Integration with popular payment gateways such as Stripe and PayPal to facilitate secure online transactions. This module will handle payment processing, ensuring compliance with PCI-DSS standards to protect sensitive payment information.

submodules.title: Transaction Management
submodules.description: A comprehensive system for managing payment transactions, including successful payments, refunds, and generating receipts. This module will provide users with transaction history and support for resolving payment-related issues.

submodules.title: Shipping Carrier Integration
submodules.description: Integration with various shipping carriers to provide real-time shipping rates and tracking information. This module will enhance user experience by allowing customers to choose their preferred shipping options during checkout.

submodules.title: Order Fulfillment Process
submodules.description: A systematic approach to managing order fulfillment, including packaging, dispatching, and tracking deliveries. This module will ensure timely delivery of products and provide users with updates on their order status.

submodules.title: Admin Dashboard
submodules.description: A centralized dashboard that provides administrators with insights into sales data, order statuses, and inventory levels. This module will feature visual analytics tools to help in decision-making and performance tracking.

submodules.title: User Management System
submodules.description: A comprehensive system for managing user accounts, including the ability to view, edit, and delete customer profiles. This module will also handle user permissions and roles to ensure secure access to the admin panel.

submodules.title: Inventory Control System
submodules.description: A module designed to track stock levels, manage product updates, and maintain supplier information. This system will help prevent stockouts and overstock situations, ensuring efficient inventory management.
